title: Home automation solution (Connected objects)
descriptions: Development of a home automation solution to control electrical devices (heating, ventilation, water heater, etc.) in my home from a mobile application and a web application, in order to reduce electricity consumption and improve comfort.

The web server part runs on Raspberry PI (Raspberry Pi OS) and is developed using Asp.Net Core (C#) for the services and KeyCloak for the authentication/authorization part, all running behind an Nginx server.

The home automation server part for controlling devices (sensors and modules) is developed in C++ and runs on Arduino and ESP8266 boards. Finally, the mobile application is developed using Xamarin.Forms (C#) and the web application in Blazor WASM (C#).
